data.name: Agatha Harkness
data.description: One of the most powerful witches alive, Agatha Harkness is a centuries-old survivor of the Salem Witch Trials who uses her potent spells to debilitate her enemies.

starItems.name: Agatha Harkness
starItems.description: One of the most powerful witches alive, Agatha Harkness is a centuries-old survivor of the Salem Witch Trials who uses her potent spells to debilitate her enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self or <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self or <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self or <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self or <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self or <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally to attack the primary target
Called ally attacks for -<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally to attack the primary target. Called ally attacks for -<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>65%</color> Piercing to primary target
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, call <color=#86e619>2</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies to attack the primary target instead

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>275%</color> Piercing.
If the primary target is <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color>, deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally to attack the primary target. Called ally attacks for -<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, call <color=#86e619>2</color> random adjacent <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies to attack the primary target instead.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing for primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + prolong the duration of all negative effects,  excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing for primary and secondary attacks

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
If the primary target has <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + prolong the duration of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

1.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy.
3.nextUpgrade:
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy.
4.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Focus for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Focus for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Healing

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Focus for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the highest damage <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemy with the highest Damage and apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the <color=#fff568>HERO</color> <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemy with the highest Damage.

Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>6</color> Ability Energy.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Focus for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade: When this character or any <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time; clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on that character, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character, and Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.
> Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade: When any enemy drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time; attack that character for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects into negative effects on that character, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to that character, and apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.
> Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When any enemy drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Attack that character for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
> Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects into negative effects on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to that character.
> Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

When this character or any <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
> Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character.
> Barrier that character for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When any enemy drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, do the following:
> Attack that character for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
> Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects into negative effects on that character.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to that character.
> Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain. <color=#fff568>DARKHOLD</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Drain.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
